text:
Canada is an unincorporated community in Marion County, Kansas, United States. It is named for many Canadian immigrants coming to the area.
History.
A post office was in Canada from February 20, 1884 to February 28, 1954.
20th century.
From 1964 to 1968, the Marion Reservoir was built north of Canada.
21st century.
In August 2015, a film crew for an advertising company in Toronto, Ontario came to Canada. They came to interview people and give away New Balance shoes for a Canadian TV commercial.
Geography.
Canada is at (38.3541802, -97.1128030), about halfway between Marion and Hillsboro.
